content: this is the pattern for my baby bobble beanie it is a fancy little hat for all those tiny newborns popping into the world to disrupt our sleep and make us speak in a goofy wittle baby voice i used an i hook but my gauge is tight so most people will probably need a g or h i used loops and threads capri yarn but any 4 weight yarn should work the capri yarn is so bright and soft thought this is only for newborn sizing no other sizing is available at this time
